assessmentItem.title: What is a codebook? Construct a codebook for the following questionnaire items.

prompt.span: What is a codebook? Construct a codebook for the following questionnaire items.
prompt.p: c. How many brothers and sisters do you have? (Count only those who are now alive. Include stepbrothers and stepsisters and children adopted by your parents.)
d. What is your current marital status?
